import s from './addFictionPage.module.css' import React, { useState } from "react"; const AddFictionPage = (props) =>{ const [form, setForm] = useState({ photoUrl: "", name: "", maker: "", genre: "", date: "", description: "", type: "" }); async function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); // When a post request is sent to the create url, we'll add a new record to the database. const newPerson = { ...form }; console.log(newPerson); } return(
) } export default AddFictionPage;
